Executive Profile
* Exceptional follow-through abilities and detail oriented; able to plan and foresee strategies from concept to successful completion * Versatile; proven ability to manage multiple projects * Able to build lasting rapport; posses strong interpersonal skills; able to work effectively with individuals on all levels, effective motivator of self and others * Capable speaker and communicator, with refined skills in presentations, education, and client relations building * A resource person, problem solver, trouble shooter and a creative turnaround banker * Self â€” assured , confident, dependable and responsible in pursuing and closing sales; thrive in challenging situations requiring the ability to learn new skills Associate with an organization that will benefit from my initiatives, capabilities and contributions, ultimately qualifying for advancement and increased decision-making responsibilities:
Core Accomplishments
Developing business within emerging and highly competitive business market; outstanding presentation, leadership qualifications Responsible of managing a team of 24 relationship managers for delivering personalized financial strategies to affluent clientele through banking and borrowing needs, as well as, investments services.
My responsibility and accountability is to manage a team that service a portfolio of affluent households with investable assets of $500, 000 up to $2,000,000 .
The primary objective of this trusted advisor is to grow client assets, retain and acquire new clients through being the single point of contact for all banking needs..
This role will require a holistic delivery of outstanding service and sales solutions to meet clients' financial needs and goals

<JD_START>
Job Title: Chief Executive Officer

Location: Greater Philadelphia

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Job Title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
East 57th Street Partners is currently seeking an exceptional Chief Executive Officer (CEO) on behalf of one of our distinguished clients. This full-time leadership role is crafted for a visionary and strategic leader who excels in guiding organizations towards achieving their strategic objectives, driving growth, and enhancing operational excellence across the enterprise.
Role Summary:The CEO will serve as the driving force behind the company's strategic direction, growth initiatives, and overall operational performance. This position demands a leader who is not only adept at identifying and capitalizing on market opportunities but also skilled in motivating a team, fostering innovation, and leading the company through periods of change. The successful candidate will embody the company's values, mission, and vision, working closely with the Board of Directors and executive leadership team to ensure the company's short-term actions align with its long-term objectives.
Key Responsibilities:Develop and execute a strategic plan to advance the company's mission and objectives, promoting revenue, profitability, and growth as an organization.Oversee the company's operations, ensuring the execution of the strategic plan through the management of day-to-day operations and organizational performance.Cultivate a strong and transparent working relationship with the Board of Directors and ensure open communication about the measurement of financial, operational, and impact performance against stated milestones and goals.Drive the company's development, focusing on strategic planning, business development, and fiscal operations.Establish and promote a positive, inclusive, and collaborative work environment that attracts, retains, and motivates top-quality personnel.Engage with customers, business partners, and external entities to strengthen the company's profile, market presence, and strategic partnerships.Ensure the company's compliance with all legal and regulatory requirements.Represent the company at various community and/or business meetings to promote the company's mission, vision, and values.Qualifications:Proven track record as a CEO or in a senior executive role within a complex organization, demonstrating the ability to navigate through change and drive organizational success.Strong understanding and experience in business fundamentals, strategic planning, and business development.Demonstrated ability to develop profitable strategies and implement the company vision.Excellent leadership, negotiation, and public speaking skills.Ability to foster a culture of transparency, integrity, and accountability.Deep understanding of financial strategies and finance-related performance metrics.Strong aptitude for decision-making and problem-solving in high-pressure environments.Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field; MBA or relevant graduate degree strongly preferred.Benefits:Competitive executive compensation package, including an attractive base salary, bonuses, and equity options.Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance packages.Retirement savings plan with company match.Generous vacation and personal leave policies.Leadership development and continuous learning opportunities.A unique opportunity to lead and shape the future of a dynamic organization with a commitment to innovation and excellence.
East 57th Street Partners is on a mission to find a CEO who will significantly impact our client's future, driving strategic initiatives and leading the organization towards achieving its full potential. This role is perfect for a strategic thinker with a passion for leadership, innovation, and growth.

Experience Level (if available): Executive
<JD_END>
